resources.string: Find Amazing Events Happening Around You

Sunburn Festival is Asia\'s biggest electronic music festival, and this December the festival returns to its homeland – Goa – for three sprawling days of house, EDM and pop on Vagator Beach. Recent lineups have included dance royalty such as Martin Garrix, Afrojack, Dimitri Vegas and Like Mike and many more
